Desc.entry: A registered charity that organises interactive musical sessions for dementia sufferers in residential homes throughout South Yorkshire, Derbyshire and North Nottinghamshire. Highly trained professional musicians perform a variety of musical styles in an effort to stimulate response from those who can't walk, talk, feed themselves or communicate in any way. Residents are encouraged to sing, sway, dance or play percussion. Gives people with dementia a vehicle through which they can continue to communicate.
